I was gonna go for the 'RELOADED Tomb Raider' torrent but because the DL speed (or lack of) I decided to give HeroMaster a try and boy,I am more than just pleased.

The game works right 'outta the box' so to speak.No cracks , keygens ,Rar files or such.Simply run the executable file,instal and play!

Works 100% without ANY HASSLE !  

BTW - This new Tomb Raider game is really really cool.The graphics are really good, the combat is fun and the plot interesting.There is also some RPG-style leveling up , weapons upgrades and skills tune-up.


This is the most mature TR to date.And by that I mean this isn't your mother's TR.

There is mature content and the game is A LOT of fun.

Kudos to HeroMaster !!!

Oh ,and please SEED! We're all in this together.My rule of thumb is to seed at least the same amount as the downloaded torrent.Although I usually seed a lot more if there aren't many seeder.

So far I'll probably seed this one at a 5:1 ratio.

Enjoy people!

I think I figured out how to get this torrent's audio work in English. Just install the game first then:
1/ Get this torrent: 
https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8218890/Tomb_Raider_SURVIVAL_EDITION_STEAM_FULL_UNLOCKED

2/ Only download the following files:
bigfile_ENGLISH.000.tiger
patch_ENGLISH.000.tiger
title_ENGLISH.000.tiger

3/ Move the following files in INSTALLED game's folder to another location for backing up purpose:
bigfile_RUSSIAN.000.tiger
patch_RUSSIAN.000.tiger
title_RUSSIAN.000.tiger

4/ Put the newly downloaded files (ones with "ENGLISH" in their name) to the installed game's folder.

I'll report soon if this works.
